channel.title: Webinars & Podcasts on Vandana Verma

item.title: Student Session: Bridge the gap between AI/ML and Cyber Security.
item.description: Session on Embedding AI/ML with Cyber Security with Sabudh Foundation for BML Munjal University (BMU), Haryana Vandana speaks on 20th February at 11a.m. on “Embedding AI/ML with Cyber Security”. To attend, register at:

item.title: DevSecOps for RazorPay
item.description: Webinar: Cybersecurity Trends & Women in Ethical Hacking | #TimesTechiesWebinars In this week’s edition of #TimesTechiesWebinars, watch India’s leading women ethical hackers speak about the current trends in cybersecurity and the plethora of options and guidance for women seeking a career in ethical hacking. The session features: Vandana Verma, Security Solutions Architect - IBM ISL Amrin Maria Khan Adawadkar, Security - Identity and Access Management at IBM India Ashwini Varadkar, Sr.
